A smaller scale version of the larger variant, Madara calls forth a shower of small meteors.

== Trivia == 
* While it debuted in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3]]'' during Madara's boss battle, it was not named until ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution]]''.
